content.question: Which of the following scenarios best describes a person who is bored because they have a high need for sensation-seeking behaviors?

choices.label: Ruth, who quits her job at a factory where she was filling boxes all day in order to work at an amusement park.
Wilson, who is preparing to hike the tallest mountain in his country for the third time this year.
Gorji, who is sailing on a ship that will take them to visit several exciting new locations heâ€™s never seen.
Ryan, who prefers a calm night at home watching television rather than attending a sold-out concert with his friends.

content.answer: Ruth, who quits her job at a factory where she was filling boxes all day in order to work at an amusement park.
